name: Aim & Throw
description:
*This game only runs on the desktop browser Introduction:

Your mission is to throw the ball into the bin. To achieve that, You can use the control key and the space bar to aim and throw the ball. There will have an indicated line that helps you to aim. You get only one chance to pitch. If you throw the ball in the bin, you win the game; Otherwise, you lose.

Control Tips：
  • Press the “WASD” or arrow key to control the view.
  • Press the Space bar to throw the ball.
  • Tweak the bottom slide to change the bounce of the ball.
  •  When you press the space bar, an indicated line will assist you in aiming the bin. The parabola will constantly change depending on how long you press the space bar.
  • Release the space bar to throw.

If you enjoy the game, please spend 1-2mins completing the survey below. Survey Thank you very much!
